jobDescription: RSM US LLP is looking for a dynamic M&A; Lead Tax Manager to join our national Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A;) Tax group. This is a rapidly growing consulting practice with significant advancement opportunities. We advise multinational corporations, privately held companies, partnerships, and private equity firms on the tax aspects of planning, structuring, and executing  M&A; transactions. You've worked hard to get where you are today. And now you're ready to use your unique skills, talents and personality to achieve great things. RSM is a place where you are valued as an individual, mentored as a future leader, and recognized for your accomplishments and potential. Working directly with clients, key decision makers and business owners across various industries and geographies, you'll move quickly along the learning curve and our clients will benefit from your fresh perspective.  Experience RSM US. Experience the power of being understood.  RSM is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. Minorities/Females/Disabled/Veterans.
